text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Department of Potosí |other_name = |native_name = |nickname = |settlement_type = |motto = |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = Laguna Colorada with flamingos in the Eduardo Avaroa Andean Fauna National Reserve |image_flag = Flag of Potosí.svg |flag_size = 100px |image_seal = |seal_size = |image_shield = Escudo de Potosí.svg |shield_size = 100px |image_map = Potosi in Bolivia.svg |mapsize = |map_caption = Location within Bolivia |image_map1 = |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = |image_dot_map = |pushpin_map = |pushpin_label_position = |pushpin_map_caption = |pushpin_mapsize = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = Capital |subdivision_name1 = Potosí |subdivision_type2 = |subdivision_name2 = |subdivision_type3 = |subdivision_name3 = |subdivision_type4 = |subdivision_name4 = |government_footnotes = |government_type = |leader_title = Governor |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |unit_pref = |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = 118218 |area_land_km2 = |area_water_km2 = |area_total_sq_mi = |area_land_sq_mi = |area_water_sq_mi = |area_water_percent = |area_urban_km2 = |area_urban_sq_mi = |area_metro_km2 = |area_metro_sq_mi = |population_as_of =2012 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total =823517 |population_density_km2 =auto |population_density_sq_mi = |population_metro = |population_density_metro_km2 = |population_density_metro_sq_mi = |population_urban = |population_density_urban_km2 = |population_density_urban_sq_mi = | timezone = BOT | utc_offset = -4 | timezone_DST = | utc_offset_DST = |coordinates = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code = |blank1_name = |blank1_info =BO-L |blank2_name =Postal abbrv. |website = |footnotes = }} Potosí is a department in Bolivia. The capital city is also named Potosí. == Provinces == The department is divided into 16 provinces which are further divided into 40 municipalities www.bolivia.com (English) and then 219 cantons.
